title: Hammer
description: Craft a hammer. Used to craft other things.

title: Axe
description: Craft an axe. Cut trees. This type of axe is not for combat

title: Pickaxe
description: Craft a pickaxe. Many rare metals await you.

title: Saw
description: Craft a saw. Used to cut wood, or magician's assistants.

title: Shovel
description: Craft a shovel. Dig a grave for your enemies, or a hole for a nice plant.

title: Sword
description: Craft a sword. Used for slicing, and also dicing (mostly of enemies, not food).

title: Helmet
description: Craft a helmet. Remember to protect your head.

title: Armor
description: Craft some armor. Using armor increases your armor class.

title: Boots
description: Craft some boots. These boots will be made for walking.

title: Kite Shield
description: Craft a kite shield. Far to heavy to fly. Can, however, block enemy attacks

title: Blade
description: Craft a blade. Sharp, but lacks a handle. Ideally used with a hilt

title: Hilt
description: Craft a hilt. Helpful for holding sharp things.

title: Bow
description: Craft a bow. Fire at your enemies from afar.

title: Wand
description: Craft a wand. Magical power not garunteed.
